list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a condition of body and mind that typically recurs for several hours every night, in which the nervous system is relatively inactive, the eyes closed, the postural muscles relaxed, and consciousness practically suspended.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was on the verge of sleep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang trên bờ vực ngủ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gummy or gritty secretion found in the corners of the eyes after sleep.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she sat up, rubbing the sleep from her eyes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ngồi dậy, dụi giấc ngủ từ mắt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be in a state of sleep; be asleep.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she slept for half an hour

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: provide (a specified number of people) with beds, rooms, or places to stay the night.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: studios sleeping two people cost $70 a night
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: studio ngủ hai người có giá 70 đô la một đêm
